CustomField.description: This field displays whether the associated potential duplicate is an Account, Contact or Lead.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT( ISNULL( CRMfusionDBR101__Account__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( CRMfusionDBR101__Account__c ) ) ), 'Account', IF( AND( NOT( ISNULL( CRMfusionDBR101__Contact__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( CRMfusionDBR101__Contact__c ) ) ), 'Contact', IF( AND( NOT( ISNULL( CRMfusionDBR101__Lead__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( CRMfusionDBR101__Lead__c ) ) ), 'Lead', TEXT(CRMfusionDBR101__Scenario_Type__c) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field displays whether the associated potential duplicate is an Account, Contact or Lead.
CustomField.label: Object Type
